TopicTitle: Game low FPS Even on lowest settings

Articles.Content:
i need help. i have a 2.20 ghz processor but i only get like 5 Fps on kerbal even with the lowest settings. how do i fix this

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-22T20:49:59Z" title="04/22/2015 08:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 22, 2015</time> by Tristonwilson12**
What's your graphics card? Setting the settings lower won't do anything to your processor.
